adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_aoe_three: Spells will affect a gargantuan area around a targeted block.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_aoe_two: Spells will affect a huge area around a targeted block.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_lesser_aoe: Spells will affect a decreased area.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_accelerate: Immensely increases the speed of projectile spells.
Greatly increases the speed of projectile spells.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_extendtime: Immensely extends the time that spells last.
Greatly extends the time that spells last.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_durationdo: Massively reduces the duration of spells.
Greatly reduces the duration of spells.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_amplify_th: Massively increases the power of most spell effects.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_amplify_tw: Greatly increases the power of most spell effects.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_dampen_thr: Massively reduces the power of spells.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_dampen_two: Greatly reduces the power of spells.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_spelleffic: Uses a glyph slot to reduce the mana cost of a spell. New Cost = Old Cost * 0.7 ^ X. Mana regeneration speed is temporarily exhausted after use.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_effectdoma: Creates a Spherical area that applies spells on nearby entities for a short time. AOE will expand the effective range, Accelerate will cast spells faster, Extend Time will increase the duration, Pierce changes the shape of the area to a dome, Extract excludes the caster from target-able entities. Amplify improves the refinement of the domain allowing it to dominate lesser domains.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_open_domai: Augments a domain to form without a barrier. A truly divine feat that imposes a domain upon the world itself.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_effectlimi: Sets the velocity of entities in an area to 0 (includes spell projectiles and other entities not normally target-able). Applying AOE will increase the radius this effect is applied. Augmenting with Amplify will multiply the velocity by: -X/3. Augmenting with Dampen will multiply the velocity by: -1. Augmenting with sensitive will affect the caster as well. Pierce alters the spell to pull all entities in the area towards the point the spell resolved when amplified.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_effecterup: Inflicts the target with Eruption. Entities with this effect take highly increased damage when burning.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_effecticeb: When the spell resolves on an ice block Iceburst will shatter the block and damage nearby entities.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_effectrais: Raises a pillar of earth, pushing away any nearby entities. Can be augmented with AOE, pierce, and amplify. (Credit to ArsOmega)
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_effectdivi: Upgraded version of lightning that deals increased damage by consuming levels of 'shocked'
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_effectsumm: Summons undead mages that cast the remainder of the spell when they strike.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_effecttens: Summons forth various shikigami from the bottomless well. Shikigami beyond the divine dogs must first be tamed through the ritual of taming.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_effectmete: Summons a meteor that falls at the spot where the spell is resolved. The meteor propagates the rest of the spell upon crashing. The greater the height the meteor falls from the remaining spell will have amplify augments added.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_effectanni: Conjures the void itself to destroy blocks without creating items and deal damage capable of bypassing most defenses.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_effectswap: Swaps the roles of the caster and target, allowing for more complex logic. (Credit to ArsOmega)
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_effectsimp: Grants a simple domain that protects against the surehit of domains.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_methoddeto: Summons a projectile that applies spell effects when this projectile hits a target or block. The projectile will resolve in the air after traveling for a set time. This time can be altered with extend time. Pierce will cause this time to reset on spell resolve.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_propdetona: Summons a projectile where the spell resolves that applies spell effects when this projectile hits a target or block. The projectile will resolve in the air after traveling for a set time. This time can be altered with extend time. Pierce will cause this time to reset on spell resolve.
adamsarsplus.ritual_desc.ritual_mage_sum: Without augments, this ritual will summon a random variety of Mysterious Mages. When augmented with a fire/water/earth essence a powerful mage will be summoned. Using an air or conjuration essence requires an elemental soul and abjuration essence requires a true elemental soul. Note: Mages can be highly destructive.
adamsarsplus.ritual_desc.ritual_ten_shad: Grants the Ten Shadows Glyph. When augmented with mana diamonds more powerful shikigami can be summoned. If the challenger defeats the shikigami alone they gain the right to summon them through the Ten Shadows Glyph.
adamsarsplus.perk_desc.thread_sixeyes: Grants the user the Six Eyes. Granting superior vision and legendary mana efficiency.
adamsarsplus.perk_desc.thread_immortal: Grants the user a set of regenerating absorption hearts that draws from your mana.
adamsarsplus.perk_desc.thread_adrenaline: Grants a boost of mana regeneration after taking damage. This boost scales based on the amount of health missing.
adamsarsplus.perk_desc.thread_draconic: Inflicts a draconic curse upon spell targets when using a damaging spell.
adamsarsplus.tenshadows.rankinvalid: You have not yet tamed this shikigami.
adamsarsplus.tenshadows.rabbit_tamed: You have now tamed: Rabbit Escape
adamsarsplus.tenshadows.deer_tamed: You have now tamed: Round Deer
adamsarsplus.tenshadows.tame_failed: Failed to tame. You must first tame the proceeding shikigami
adamsarsplus.page.adamsarsplus_tweaks: To begin the content of Ars Plus you'll want to hunt the Mysterious Mages that have appeared across your world and obtain their Mage Cloth. Once you're ready, craft a ritual of Mage Summoning to challenge the strongest of mages and obtain their magecraft.
adamsarsplus.page.adamsarsplus_tweaks_2: If you'd like to submit a custom Mysterious Mage of your own, message @th3S3nate on the Ars Nouveau discord under the Ars Plus channel :)
adamsarsplus.page.elemental_soul: The culmination of the three elements that formed the material plane. With the basic elements of creation under your control you've gained all you need to take your magecraft to the next tier.
adamsarsplus.page.true_elemental_soul: The culmination of the elements that form heaven and earth. With the power of the heavens under your control you've reached the apex of what should be possible with magic... but whispers from the void speak of power beyond comprehension.
adamsarsplus.page.ryan_hood: Taking your Tier 3 mage armor you've discovered how to augment it with the elemental flame souls you've obtained to push your magecraft to an elite level.
adamsarsplus.page.ryan_hood_a: Using the culmination of the elements composing the material plane you've discovered how to awaken the latent potential within your flame armor and upgrade it to Tier 4.
adamsarsplus.page.cade_hood: Taking your Tier 3 mage armor you've discovered how to augment it with the elemental frost souls you've obtained to push your magecraft to an elite level.
adamsarsplus.page.cade_hood_a: Using the culmination of the elements composing the material plane you've discovered how to awaken the latent potential within your frost armor and upgrade it to Tier 4.
adamsarsplus.page.nick_hood: Taking your Tier 3 mage armor you've discovered how to augment it with the elemental earth souls you've obtained to push your magecraft to an elite level.
adamsarsplus.page.nick_hood_a: Using the culmination of the elements composing the material plane you've discovered how to awaken the latent potential within your earth armor and upgrade it to Tier 4.
adamsarsplus.page.camr_hood: Taking your Elemental mage armor you've discovered how to augment it with the elemental lightning souls you've obtained to push your magecraft to an ascendant level.
adamsarsplus.page.camr_hood_a: Using the culmination of the elements composing the heavenly and material plane you've discovered how to awaken the latent potential within your lightning armor and upgrade it to Tier 5.
adamsarsplus.page.matt_hood: Taking your Elemental mage armor you've discovered how to augment it with the elemental ancient souls you've obtained to push your magecraft to an ascendant level.
adamsarsplus.page.matt_hood_a: Using the culmination of the elements composing the heavenly and material plane you've discovered how to awaken the latent potential within your hero armor and upgrade it to Tier 5.
adamsarsplus.page.adam_hood: Taking your Ascendant mage armor you've discovered how to augment it with the elemental void souls you've obtained to push your magecraft to a level beyond what should be possible.
adamsarsplus.page.adam_hood_a: Using the elements of the void plane you've discovered how to awaken the latent potential within your void armor and upgrade it to Tier 6.
